title: @OCE Rioters, I have a challenge for you.
body: What was the exact date that I joined LoL and what were my 2 previous names on this account?

replies.body:
They could easily do this.

But they definitely wont.

I'm curious though. I half expect them to only be able to find 1 previous name and only have the date that I transferred to OCE, not when I actually created the account.

I want to see a) if any Rioters from OCE actually have the authority to find this information, and b) how far back Riot keeps data.

> [{quoted}](name=Red Arrow,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EjX8HfqK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-27T07:13:55.530+0000)
>
> I'm curious though. I half expect them to only be able to find 1 previous name and only have the date that I transferred to OCE, not when I actually created the account.
> 
> I want to see a) if any Rioters from OCE actually have the authority to find this information, and b) how far back Riot keeps data.

They definitely can track such data, they use this data for account retrieval purposes so they will certainly not give you this information. They know the first champion you bought, the first champion you played, what accounts have been accessed from your IP address, they know what ISP you use, and for how long, they know what date the account was created, and what time of day, they know the last time you scratched your nose.

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EjX8HfqK,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-27T07:34:17.624+0000)
>
> They definitely can track such data, they use this data for account retrieval purposes so they will certainly not give you this information. They know the first champion you bought, the first champion you played, what accounts have been accessed from your IP address, they know what ISP you use, and for how long, they know what date the account was created, and what time of day, they know the last time you scratched your nose.

TLDR They've been watching you. Closely.
